text:
Keeping Up With The Tradition, Priyanka Chopra Threw Cake At Audience During Steve Aoki’s Concert
Keeping Up With The Tradition, Priyanka Chopra Threw Cake At Audience During Steve Aoki’s Concert
A couple of years ago, on his 39th birthday, Steve Aoki threw cakes at his fans during a concert. But seemingly, it didn’t end so well.
youredm.com
A fan decided to turn the tables and throw the cake back at him. The DJ equipment was disrupted because of hardware malfunction and the music had stopped.
Just in case you didn’t know, DJ Steve Aoki is known for throwing cake at the audiences during his shows. Caking is like an honour bestowed on his die-hard fans. So, this time at his Los Angeles concert, Priyanka Chopra along with Jonas Brothers hung out with the DJ. Keeping up with the tradition, they all threw cakes at the audiences and seemingly had the most fun while doing so.
“Cakes were flyyyyyying last night but this time by new cake recruits @priyankachopra @nickjonas & @joejonas. We made a mess. Sorry @davegrutman @storymiami,” Steve Aoki wrote.

Priyanka Chopra was recently enjoying a vacation with hubby Nick Jonas, Joe Jonas and Sophie Turner. They all were seen dancing to Bollywood number Taarefan on a yatch. It looked like they had loads of fun.
Priyanka Chopra and Jonas Brothers are having the time of their life, it seems.
